        as - accounting schema
        AD_Org_ID - real org

      • setCosts

        public void setCosts(BigDecimal amt,
                     BigDecimal qty,
                     int precision)
        Update Record. ((OldAvg*OldQty)+(Price*Qty)) / (OldQty+Qty)
        Parameters:
        amt - total Amount
        qty - quantity
        precision - costing precision
